job_listings.title: Data Analyst
job_listings.description: We are looking for a data analyst to join our growing team...
job_listings.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field. 2+ years of experience with SQL and data visualization tools. Experience with Python or R.
job_listings.responsibilities: Analyze large datasets to identify trends and patterns. Create dashboards and visualizations to communicate insights. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support data-driven decision making.

job_listings.title: Senior Data Analyst
job_listings.description: XYZ Corp is seeking a senior data analyst to lead our analytics initiatives...
job_listings.requirements: Master's degree preferred. 5+ years of experience in data analysis. Expert in SQL, Python, and visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI.
job_listings.responsibilities: Lead data analysis projects from conception to completion. Mentor junior analysts. Work with stakeholders to define business requirements and KPIs.

job_listings.title: Data Analyst - Finance
job_listings.description: Join our finance analytics team to support data-driven decision making...
job_listings.requirements: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field. Experience with financial data analysis. SQL and Excel proficiency required.
job_listings.responsibilities: Develop financial reports and dashboards. Perform ad-hoc analysis to answer business questions. Support budget planning and forecasting.

job_listings.title: Junior Data Analyst
job_listings.description: Exciting opportunity for a junior data analyst to join our fast-growing startup...
job_listings.requirements: Bachelor's degree. Knowledge of SQL and Excel. Interest in data visualization and business intelligence.
job_listings.responsibilities: Assist in data collection and cleaning. Create basic reports and visualizations. Support the senior analytics team with various projects.

job_listings.title: Data Analyst - Retail
job_listings.description: We are looking for a data analyst to help optimize our retail operations...
job_listings.requirements: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field. 3+ years of experience in retail analytics. Strong SQL skills and experience with BI tools.
job_listings.responsibilities: Analyze sales data to identify trends and opportunities. Create regular reports for management. Support inventory optimization initiatives.

job_listings.title: Data Analyst (m/f/d)
job_listings.description: Join our analytics team to help drive data-based decisions...
job_listings.requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in a quantitative field. Experience with Python, SQL, and data visualization. German language skills are a plus.
job_listings.responsibilities: Analyze business data and create insights. Develop and maintain dashboards. Collaborate with product and marketing teams to define metrics.
